Package index

All functions

beta_dist()
Sample Beta Distribution and Return Density
calculate_allee_effects()
Calculate Within-Species Pairwise Colony Distances with Status Label
calculate_egg_densities()
Calculate volumetric density of spheres with percent surface cover
calculate_intraspecific_allee_dist()
Calculate Intraspecific Pairwise Colony Distances as sf LINESTRINGs
coralsim()
Simulate Coral Colonies in a Polygon
map_populations()
Map Coral Populations with Species Coloring
polyp_density_data
Load and augment coral polyp density data
posterior_coral_predict()
Generate Posterior Predictions of Coral Colony Area
predict_colony_width()
Predict colony width using posterior predict (lognormal model)
predict_oocytes()
Predict oocytes per reproductive polyp using posterior predict (ZIP model)
predict_polyp_density()
Predict polyp density per colony using posterior predict (gaussian model)
predict_repro_prob()
Predict reproductive probability using posterior predict (bernoulli model)
sample_sterile_zone()
Sample Sterile Zone Proportions by Species
setplot()
Generate a Rectangular sf Plot Grid
simulate_bleaching()
Assign Bleaching Status to Coral Population
simulate_community()
Simulate Coral Community Composition
simulate_coralsize()
Simulate Coral Colony Sizes Using Skewed Distributions
simulate_populations()
Simulate Coral Population Layout from Posterior Predictions
simulate_spawning()
Simulate Spawning Output per Coral Colony
sp_order
Load and preprocess coral fecundity and size data
sp_pal()
Generate Species Color Palette
